description: This course continues the studies begun in 391. Students consider recruitment and music administration and composing and arranging music for worship. Prerequisite: Music 391. Offered Spring Semester, 2006-07, and alternate years.
name: Church Music Pract II
prerequisites: Music 391. Offered Spring Semester, 2006-07, and alternate years.

revisions.prerequisites: Prerequisite: Music 391. Offered Spring Semester, 2006-07, and alternate years.

title: Church Music Practicum II
